about_the_game:
CLUTCH: THE ULTIMATE REALISTIC DRIFTING SIMULATOR
Clutch is a passion project designed to deliver the most authentic drifting experience available in a "game" format. Built for enthusiasts and professionals alike, Clutch simulates the intricacies of real-life drifting, from tire grip to throttle control, all wrapped in a highly moddable, community-driven package.

FEATURES

  • Continuously Evolving Experience:

    While still in its early stages, this game is a work in progress that will be continuously updated and improved based on player feedback and ongoing development.

  • True-to-Life Driving Dynamics:
    Feel the road as you master clutch kicks, countersteering, and throttle modulation, all designed to replicate the physics of real drifting.

  • Unmatched Modding Support:
    Expand the experience with fully open modding capabilities, giving players the freedom to create cars, tracks, and gameplay adjustments.

  • Immersive VR Integration:
    Dive into the world of drifting with support for all major VR platforms, putting you directly in the driver’s seat.

  • Universal Peripheral Compatibility:
    Whether you're using USB steering wheels, controllers, or other devices, Clutch ensures seamless support for your preferred setup.

  • Interactive Spectator Mode:
    Relive the thrill of community drifting events by watching and interacting as others take on the track. Engage with the action, just like at a real drift meet.

YOUR DRIFTING JOURNEY STARTS HERE
Whether you're chasing the perfect line, looking to sharpen your skills, or creating your own custom experience, Clutch is built to evolve with you. With a focus on realism, fun, and community, this is more than a simulator—it’s a drift lifestyle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • VR Support: Any PC VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • VR Support: Any PC VR

short_description: Clutch is an effort to create the closest to real life car drifting simulation but in a “game” form. The goal is to create a professional level game that closest simulates real driving with the largest support for modding. The secondary goal is to mimic the fun of real life drifting and community.
